评论详情: I'm 5'6", 188lbs.  The one size had lots of hip/chest room and just hit the bottom of my butt on the back. I bought the black and white one.  I wore it with a black knit cami, black leggings, black slingback heels and bold silver jewelry.  Easy way to look dressed up!
Great to dress up or down

评论概述: Fun, colorful, very soft (doesn’t itch), breezy, kind to many body types!  😊
评论详情: I am a 5’5” and a plus size wearing xl to 2x depending on  the style, etc.. In terms of sizing, I think I am at the upper limits of who can wear this. It doesn’t fall off the shoulder and I couldn’t use it as a loose coverup,  but it will work great as a loose top over a tank top.  It is shorter in the front and longer in the back (😍).  On me, the neckline is scooped. That is fine, and it will better for work.  I was really surprised by the fabric. Nice, sheer, and  really soft.  It isn’t itchy and it is airy. It drapes nicely. How much more could anyone who wants to hide some lumps and pumps and be cool in the hot sun ask for?  Go for it.

评论概述: THIS RUNS BIG BUT I LOVE, LOVE IT.
评论详情: I LOVE THIS SHIRT. I have almost all the colors. With that said, I wear an XL, am a DD and I have to have them them altered about an inch on each side. My daughter does it in about 5 minutes now. I used to pay 15.00 to have it done. Either way, it was worth it. I war them causally or dress them up with a tank underneath. They are great for hot weather,. I carry equipment around and boxes that are dirty but have to look business casual for my customer visits and this is perfect. I can wash in cold water and dry if needed but I hang dry them. I always get complements and will keep buying until I have all I like. have 6 now.

评论概述: Juicy words printed in the design
评论详情: I was not aware that this blouse had words printed on it. I assumed it was simply the black and white animal print. The print really makes it look cheap. I like the other patterns fine.
Blouse is exactly as described. As some customers have stated, it isn't necessarily off the shoulder like in photo unless you are smaller like the model in photo. However, it does fit and look great.

I love off the shoulder chiffon. This was not one of them! The neckline is standard, okay. The forearms are tight, big negative. The pattern, I love. The length hits just below my pelvic line, when naked, if I do not move.  I compared this "one-size" to others. The width is 5 inches smaller and 3 inches shorter. This one-size fits most, off the shoulder is meant for the XS to Small frames. It fits my daughter 113 lbs, 5'3" like the photos displayed.  We purchased 5 more! Now, another was purchased where the arms are cut in the "bat wings." I'm betting it will be tight for me (XL) and perfect for my daughter.  I wear this blouse as a standard shirt. I need to keep cool in this Texas heat. Me? I'm 5'4", 190 lbs and hot flashing! 😊

评论概述: Medium quality fabric and construction, accurate images
评论详情: This top in the abstract black/maroon/slate floral pattern has a lovely design and vibrant colors. It looks just like the images. Big plus for the use of matching black chiffon fabric to bind the neck opening. However, the chiffon quality is slightly below average, meaning that the fabric is not as flowy or opaque as better quality chiffon fabric. The looser weave (lower thread count) means it is more prone to snagging, which happened to my top after washing and steaming out the folds. The construction is also imperfect, with a series of small puckers along the side seams. Still like it and will wear it over a sleeveless black dress for a nice pop of color.

The top is nice and comfortable but the blouse is a slightly different color than advertised. This green camouflage top is really green and BROWN(dark winter colors instead of green and tan (spring/summer colors)
Love this top! Very flowy (hides well!) and colors are fun - length is perfect - not too short or long
It’s beautiful! It will fit many since its one size fits all… is very wide. But, remember to measure the width of your arms before buying. The sleeve cuffs measure about 12 1/2“ (around).
Would definitely buy again
I returned this product. It was pretty and the quality was fine I just did not like the fit. It was somewhat boxy and I felt wide in it.

Nice print. Could be dressed up or casual. It is an oversized top. Would look nice with leggings and a tank or long sleeved top underneath. It covers my bum. I also have worn it with a very fitted black tank dress and it looked nice that way too.

The fabric print I chose is just like the picture.  It's soft, sheer chiffon, but the forearm holes are a bit snug for me (Plus size 20).  The end of the sleeve has a cute cuff look.  I like that bit of detail but it made it a bit snug on my forearm. Also the blouse hits just at the top of my hips, probably because my "Girls" hike up the overall length.  It's good for adding a bit of sleeve/cover for sleeveless or spaghetti strapped attire for the summer.  I will pair with aforementioned tops or sleeveless maxi dresses and jeans.  This could go casual, office or date night. I'd order from this design again.
Blouse to wear over a tank, comfortable. I haven't worn it yet but I am sure it will be great.
Wanted a poncho that could be worn multiple ways. This was a hit! I received a lot of compliments wearing it with jeans and over a long slip dress. It will be a vacation staple.
It is light, comfortable, I really liked it, I bought it again in different colors.
The neck is smaller than pictured, a little shorter also N I was hoping for N a looser fit. Nice shirt bought for cruise ship smart casual nite. Will definitely wear it!

These tops are super cute and will fit a variety of shapes.  I normally wear an XL and these tops would fit several sizes larger than that.  They are attractive and comfortable.  They can be worn with jeans, nice pants, as a beach coverup and basically anything you want to pair them with.  They make a nice pair of jeans dressy with very little effort.  The colors were true to the picture (at least in my case).  I now own 4 of these.  They are perfect for hot SC summers and to take on cruise and other vacations.  Buy one (or two or three), you won't regret it.
Love these! I have in two designs and wear with tank tops. Easy, breezy and covers my upper arms and butt.

Love this so much, I think you will not be disappointed.

This top is a one size fits all. I am a size 18. It is a tad snug in the arms but still is flowy when I wear it. Hits below waist. If you are smaller this would be more flow on you. There is no stretch to the fabric. I wash 8n the washer and hang to dry. Can snag on things if you are not careful.
I really like the top but not the tape binding used around the neck. Why would you use black when it was a navy top and there are no other accents of black in the top. Makes it look cheap

It is as delicate as it looks. stitching is appropriate to the garment...sewing is appropriate to the fabric..not too tight.
